amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 115-786 to lift the ban on striped bass fishing in the Block Island transit zone between Montauk, NY and Block Island, RI.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Zeldin amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Zeldin.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Zeldin amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
